Kanie

Group (2024-present):
ODD YOUTH

Introduction

Kanie is a South Korean singer under TOP Media.

She was revealed as a member of the girl group ODD YOUTH on September 25, 2024. She debuted with them on November 1, 2024, with the release of their first single "Best Friendz".
